rComments: Susy is the best!!!! Her class was amazing and she had a few guest lecturers; all of which were great!!! Her tests are pretty easy and all you really need to know are the main points which she discusses in class and for the final she gives a study guide. HIGHLY RECOMMEND HER CLASS! Made me realize SOCY is definitely my the right choice!

It was a very slow class, I feel like by the end of it I didn't learn anything. The required projects are loosely defined and assigned groups are frustrating. In lecture only takes quotes from the reading. A really nice person, with a good attitude though.

Susy is amazing. just go to class ready to participate. she gives a lot of reading but knows that it is not possible to read all of it so as long as you get just ONE chapter done and can participate in class she will be happy. the class was easy and fun to go to. She really cares for her students.  i definitely recommend taking a class with her.

She is honestly a GREAT teacher!!! The material she teaches is super interesting and her lectures are really eye opening and fun... She does have reading but you don't have to buy a textbook and the readings are really interesting! If you have the chance to get a class with her then DO IT! One of the best SOCY teachers out there!
